name: Oblivion
description: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
casts: Tom Cruise, Morgan Freeman, Andrea Riseborough

name: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.
casts: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk

name: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
description: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.
casts: Anthony Ramos, Dominique Fishback, Luna Lauren Velez
